publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5835 Jackie Baillie: No Smoking Day 2010â€”That the Parliament congratulates the No Smoking Day charity on its 27th annual public health campaign, which will take place on 10 March 2010; notes that one in 10 smokers inScotlandmade a quit attempt on No Smoking Day last year; further notes that smoking remains the number one cause of premature avoidable death in Scotland with 13,500 deaths due to smoking every year, and considers that there is aneed for continued support of No Smoking Day.

S3M-5835 No Smoking Day 2010 (lodged on 26 February 2010) John Wilson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Kenneth Gibson*, James Kelly*, Des McNulty*, Rhona Brankin*, Marlyn Glen*, John Park*, Brian Adam*, Patricia Ferguson*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Karen Whitefield*, Bill Kidd*, David Whitton*, Andy Kerr*, Ian McKee*, Bill Butler*, Robin Harper*, Gil Paterson*, Elaine Murray*, Stuart McMillan*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S3M-5835 No Smoking Day 2010 (lodged on 26 February 2010) Sarah Boyack*, Hugh Henry*, Mary Mulligan*
